players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso I found last night."
Charlie: "Bob is trying to deflect attention from himself with this accusation."
Bob: "I think Charlie is the mafioso and I'd like to investigate him further."
You: "I think Charlie is the mafioso because he remained silent and Bob accused him first."
